trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies an encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 表示識別已加密的金鑰的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause 不需要使用，除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的參考參考都包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭內的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考是指不包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考通常會證明這些發出的安全性權杖的真實性。

trans-unit.source: Use the EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause class to reference an encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause 類別，參考已加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A> method returns the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A>方法會傳回加密的金鑰。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] accepts wrapped keys that are well formed with respect to the wire format.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會接受 wire 格式正確的已包裝的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key wrap algorithm specified on the wire is accepted and used.
trans-unit.target: 會接受 wire 上指定的金鑰包裝演算法，並使用。

trans-unit.source: It is not verified to be compatible with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> specified by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 相容與不驗證它<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite>端點所指定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key that is encrypted and the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>類別使用加密的指定索引鍵和用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中使用靜態常數字串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>指定的密碼編譯演算法`encryptionMethod`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains a key that is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>其中包含已加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，傳回從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>

trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedKey is .

trans-unit.source: encryptedKey is zero length.
trans-unit.target: encryptedKey長度為零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, and a key identifier for the encrypting key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>類別使用的指定的金鑰加密，用來加密金鑰，以及用於加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中使用靜態常數字串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>指定的密碼編譯演算法`encryptionMethod`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains a key that is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>其中包含已加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，傳回從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier for the encrypting key that is specified in the `encryptedKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>表示中所指定之加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼`encryptedKey`參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, a key identifier for the encrypting key and a user-readable name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>類別使用的指定的金鑰加密，用來加密金鑰、 加密金鑰和使用者可讀名稱的金鑰識別碼的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.target: 中使用靜態常數字串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>指定的密碼編譯演算法`encryptionMethod`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier for the encrypting key specified in the `encryptedKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>中指定的加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼表示`encryptedKey`參數。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*>

trans-unit.source: A user-readable name that is associated with the key specified in the `encryptedKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中指定索引鍵相關聯的使用者可讀名稱`encryptedKey`參數。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, a key identifier for the key and a user-readable name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>類別使用的指定的金鑰加密，用來加密金鑰、 金鑰和使用者可讀名稱的金鑰識別碼的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: When the `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are specified the implied derived key is used instead of the direct security key of the token.
trans-unit.target: 當`derivationNonce`和`derivationLength`指定參數的隱含衍生的金鑰會用來取代語彙基元的直接安全性金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中使用靜態常數字串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>指定的密碼編譯演算法`encryptionMethod`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains a key that is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>其中包含已加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，傳回從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey*>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier for the key specified in the `encryptedKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>中指定的金鑰的金鑰識別碼表示`encryptedKey`參數。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptingKeyIdentifier*>

trans-unit.source: A user-readable name that is associated with the key specified in the `encryptedKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中指定索引鍵相關聯的使用者可讀名稱`encryptedKey`參數。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName*>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>其中包含用來建立衍生的金鑰的 nonce。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 衍生金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>

trans-unit.source: encryptionMethod is .
trans-unit.target: encryptionMethodis .

trans-unit.source: -or- encryptedKey is .
trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedKey is .

trans-unit.source: encryptedKey is zero length.
trans-unit.target: encryptedKey長度為零。

trans-unit.source: Gets a user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 取得與加密金鑰有關聯的使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the CarriedKeyName property is serialized into XML, it is placed in the <`CarriedKeyName`> element.
trans-unit.target: 當 CarriedKeyName 屬性序列化為 XML 時，它會放置於`CarriedKeyName`> 項目。

trans-unit.source: For encrypted keys, the <`CarriedKeyName`> element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value.
trans-unit.target: 加密金鑰， `CarriedKeyName`> 項目是選擇性項目關聯的索引鍵值的使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name can then be used to reference the key using the <`KeyName`> element within the <`KeyInfo`> element.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱可以再用來參考索引鍵使用`KeyName`> 內的項目`KeyInfo`> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The same <`CarriedKeyName`> element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document.
trans-unit.target: 相同`CarriedKeyName`> 項目值，不同於為識別碼的值，可以發生多次單一文件中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key must be the same in all <`EncryptedKey`> elements identified with the same <`CarriedKeyName`> name within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的值必須是相同的所有`EncryptedKey`> 具有相同識別的項目`CarriedKeyName`> 中的 XML 文件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 加密的金鑰相關聯的使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a key identifier for the encrypting key.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier for the encrypting key.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>表示加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the value of the EncryptionMethod property is one of the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，EncryptionMethod 屬性的值是其中一個靜態常數字串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>類別。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 取得加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The array that is returned by the GetEncryptedKey method is a clone of the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: GetEncryptedKey 方法所傳回的陣列是加密金鑰的複製。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>包含加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體的金鑰識別碼是否等於指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>進行比較。

trans-unit.source: if keyIdentifierClause is of type and has the same encrypted key, encryption method and user-readable name as the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyIdentifierClause 的型別和具有相同的已加密金鑰、 加密方法以及使用者可讀取的名稱與目前的執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: keyIdentifierClause is .
trans-unit.target: keyIdentifierClauseis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified encrypted key, encryption method and user-readable name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體的金鑰識別碼是否等於指定的加密的金鑰、 加密方法以及使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains a key that is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>其中包含已加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 加密的金鑰相關聯的使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: if the encryptedKey, encryptionMethod and carriedKeyName parameters have the same values returned by the method and the and the properties, respectively; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 encryptedKey ， encryptionMethod 和 carriedKeyName 參數擁有相同的值傳回<> *> 方法和<> *> 和屬性，分別; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that contains the encrypted key and the cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法會傳回字串，包含加密的金鑰和用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: The current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件。
